issue.title: nnp_training updated

repository.name: torchani
repository.description: Accurate Neural Network Potential on PyTorch

issue.body:
This PR Fixes #243 
- Weight initialization to Kaiming normal with a=1
- Biases initialized to zeros
- exponential loss is removed from the training process
- The pretraining loop is removed

issue.title: Adapt neurochem trainer to NC setup

repository.name: torchani
repository.description: Accurate Neural Network Potential on PyTorch

issue.body:
Here is the summary of the changes in `torchani/neurochem/__init__.py` in order to adapt to the current NC setup and fix #243.

- In NC the weights are initialized to He Kaiming normal and the biases to zero. 
- Loss is scaled by sqrt(natoms).
- AdamW optimizer is used to update weights and SGD for the biases.
- Ignite is ignored.
- Warnings are removed.

issue.title: Remove the first layer's weight decay parameters of each atomic network

repository.name: torchani
repository.description: Accurate Neural Network Potential on PyTorch

issue.body:
This PR fixes #243

Neurochem does not apply weight decay to the parameters of the first layer in each atomic network. It skips that layer even if the weight decay parameter is provided. To make Torchani's training identical to Neurochem the `inputtrain.ipt` files should have the right setup.

issue.title: Update nnp_training to have identical setup to NC

repository.name: torchani
repository.description: Accurate Neural Network Potential on PyTorch

issue.body:
This PR fixes #243 

Make `nnp_training.py` setup identical to Neurochem.
- Fixed docs, removed warnings
- SGD added
- Removed 1st layer's weight decay parameters
